pages.text: Gamemode Blocks can be used to change gamemode or restrict people of certain gamemodes from accessing certain areas.

Gamemode Setters will change the gamemode of any non-creative player who touches them to their respective gamemode.$(br)This is temporary and once they stop touching one they will return to their previous gamemode.

Gamemode Blockers will block players of their respective gamemode from being able to touch things on the other side of them.$(br)This can stop players from pressing buttons or other similar situations.
Gamemode Barriers will act as ordinary barriers, but only for those who's gamemode matches the barrier.
